CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(Referral_Type__c, "52 Bank Tier 2") , IF (AND(PartnerId__c != null , NOT(ISBLANK(ReferralPaymentStart__c)), ReferralPaymentStart__c <= TODAY() , OR (ISBLANK(ReferralPaymentEnd__c), ReferralPaymentEnd__c >= TODAY()) ) ,"Local Bank with Agreement" ,"Local Bank without Agreement") , IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Referral_Type__c, "52 Bank Tier 1"), PartnerId__c != null) ,SecondaryLeadSourceValue__c ,"") )
CustomField.label: Secondary Lead Source
